title: P2 基本不等式应用
content:
P2
已知
 x>0,y>0;x+2y=1 













 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

，求
 x^{2}+4y^{2}+2xy 








 
 
 
 

 
 

 
 
 
 

的最小值.

P3
已知
 a>0,b>0;a+2b=1 













 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

，求
 \frac{b^{2}+a+1}{ab}  











 
 
 
 
 
 


 
 



的最小值.

P4
已知
 x>0,y>0;xy^{2}(x+y)=4 















 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

，求
 2x+y 







 
 
 
 

的最小值.

P5
已知
 x,y\ge 0;x^{2}+4y^{2}+4xy+4x^{2}y^{2}=32 














 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 

 
 


 
 

 

 
 


，求
 \sqrt{7} (x+2y)+2xy 











 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 

的最大值.

title: P1 小题
content:
P1
方程
 x^{4}+ax^{3}+ax^{2}+ax+1=0 












 
 
 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 

 有实数根,求
a




 

的取值范围

title: Hello World
content:
Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.
Quick Start
Create a new post
1$ hexo new "My New Post"
More info: Writing
Run server
1$ hexo server
More info: Server
Generate static files
1$ hexo generate
More info: Generating
Deploy to remote sites
1$ hexo deploy
More info: Deployment
